name: rdr2-collector-map
description: Collector map for Red Dead Redemption 2 Online
author: Matthew Palmer <mspalmer91@gmail.com>

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently 'npm run js:watch' 'npm run sass:watch'
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && concurrently 'npm run js' 'npm run sass' && npm run copy
scripts.sass:watch: npm run sass && npm run sass -- -rw
